I wanna root Acanthopagrus_latus_1
```{r}


tree_5_rooted <- root(tree_5,
                      outgroup = "Acanthopagrus_latus_1",
                      resolve.root = TRUE)
tree_5_rooted <- ladderize(tree_5_rooted)
plot(tree_5_rooted,
    align.tip.label = TRUE,
     cex = 0.5,
     no.margin = TRUE)
```
